column5: Hi everyone,  I got a Quantum Kinetic PTi and an Abu Garcia spinning reels a few years ago, and both came with spare spools. The spare spools were in a bag of mine that was stolen, and I'm trying to figure out if it's possible to replace them.  Thanks, Mike

I think you generally can get replacement spools for better quality reels.  Probably any tackle shop that does repairs would be able to get you one.  Or you could have a look at this site http://www.reeldr.com/
contact the manufacturer. you should be able to order directly from them. i know shimano does for sure. you can get any part of a reel directly from them.
Call Aiekmans they can deal with abu and quantum. 905-277-3595  Hope this helps Daniel
Thanks guys, I didn't think of calling Aikman's. I've gone to them in the past for reel repairs, so I will give them a call and see what they can do.  Mike
